name: Herb Ranch Salad Dressing Recipe by Tasty
description: Here's what you need: greek yogurt, mayonnaise, fresh dill, dried thyme, garlic powder, onion powder, fresh parsley, lemon juice, salt, freshly ground black pepper, milk
recipeInstructionSteps: Add the ingredients into a mason jar. Screw the lid on tightly and shake vigorously.
The dressing can remain in the fridge for 1-2 weeks.
Pour over your favorite salad ingredients and enjoy!
